comment: Outstanding all around ! From the wine & beer selection to the mouth watering dinner fare & professional wait staff. Even though it wasn't on the menu, they made me the most unique, spectacularly dazzling, taste bud popping Bloody Mary. Instead of a tomato juice based mixer, I believe they used a freshly pureed tomato. The drink was light pink & exceptionally spiced!  We'll be going back again & again. Thanks for the experience.

reviewReply.comment: Thank you, Glenn, for your fantastic feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you had such an outstanding experience at Whispering Vine. comment: Great place to celebrate life, your love of wine,  and delicious food. Atmosphere is woody, cozy, busy, buzzing, and romantic. Sit at small  intimate tables tucked in the wine storage racks. Affordable tasting flights are available at the bar pair well with a mountain sunset view. The restaurant is deceptively big and quite popular. Great foodie options to try, including duck confit tacos, Thai mussels, meatballs, citrus goat cheese salad, charcuterie, small bites, entrees and desserts. Servers are very knowledgeable about wine for pairing, and bottles are for sale. Easy place to drop several hundred dollars on wine and food at dinner an evening out with friends, but also possible to order affordable items on a date and have a great time.

reviewReply.comment: Colleen, what a great review! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a great rating!

comment: A nice wine bar , they have some nice bottles for sale as well, glass size is generous glasses are not very big however. Some staff are new others more seasoned . Nice private areas in the cellar . The flights do not change often and contain wines that they want to sell some are not always what I would choose . Wines by the glass as well as by the bottle prices are reasonable. Food menu looked good but we did not try. Close to my location and making it a regular hang out .

reviewReply.comment: Arniceous, Thank you for taking the time to check us out and give us a review. We think our 8oz pours are generous, but you can always just grab a bottle, with no corkage fee. Our 9oz flights are rotated weekly at our 4th Street location. We hope you return to try our food menu, the burger and truffle tots are a favorite. Cheers!
